title: Lecture 4
content:
Function Calls How many total lines of output will show up if you run the code below?
def add(x, y):return x+ydef mult(x, y):print(x*y)add(1,2)print(add(2,3))mult(3,4)print(mult(4,5)) 0 close 2 close 4 check 5 close Check   Show Solution Viewing videos requires an internet connection View video page Download video Download transcript Functions as Arguments What does the code below print?
def sq(func, x):y = x**2return func(y)def f(x):return x**2calc = sq(f, 2)print(calc) 4 close 8 close 16 check nothing, it will show an error close Check   Show Solution Viewing videos requires an internet connection View video page Download video Download transcript
